metadata.title: Package pam_ldap Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package pam_ldap should be removed.

metadata.title: Service ip6tables Enabled
metadata.description: The ip6tables service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package iptables-ipv6 installed and service ip6tables is configured to start
service ip6tables is configured to start

metadata.title: Service psacct Enabled
metadata.description: The psacct service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package psacct installed and service psacct is configured to start
service psacct is configured to start

metadata.title: Service postfix Enabled
metadata.description: The postfix service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package postfix installed and service postfix is configured to start
service postfix is configured to start

metadata.title: Service sshd Disabled
metadata.description: The sshd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package openssh-server removed or service sshd is not configured to start
service sshd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Disable hfs Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module hfs should be disabled.

metadata.title: Restrict Serial Port Root Logins
metadata.description: Preventing direct root login to serial port interfaces helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

metadata.title: Mount Remote Filesystems with nodev
metadata.description: The nodev option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

metadata.title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk Starting to Run Low on Space
metadata.description: space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

metadata.title: Package bind Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package bind should be removed.

metadata.title: Service httpd Disabled
metadata.description: The httpd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package httpd removed or service httpd is not configured to start
service httpd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Verify that All World-Writable Directories Have Sticky Bits Set
metadata.description: The sticky bit should be set for all world-writable directories.

criterion.comment: all local world writable directories have sticky bit set

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies set to 1

metadata.title: Service dovecot Disabled
metadata.description: The dovecot service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package dovecot removed or service dovecot is not configured to start
service dovecot is not configured to start

metadata.title: Package qpid-cpp-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package qpid-cpp-server should be removed.

metadata.title: Service restorecond Enabled
metadata.description: The restorecond service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package policycoreutils installed and service restorecond is configured to start
service restorecond is configured to start

metadata.title: Verify /var/log/audit Ownership
metadata.description: Checks that all /var/log/audit files and directories are owned by the root user and group.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fchmodat
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Service kdump Disabled
metadata.description: The kdump service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package kexec-tools removed or service kdump is not configured to start
service kdump is not configured to start

metadata.title: Set SHA512 Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/login.defs
metadata.description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/login.defs.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fchownat
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Ensure /tmp Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: The /tmp directory is a world-writable directory used for temporary file storage. Verify that it has its own partition or logical volume.

metadata.title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
metadata.description: The password minimum length should be set appropriately.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects" should be set to "0".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects set to 0

metadata.title: Service abrtd Disabled
metadata.description: The abrtd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package abrt removed or service abrtd is not configured to start
service abrtd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Bind Mount /var/tmp To /tmp
metadata.description: The /var/tmp directory should be bind mounted to /tmp in order to consolidate temporary storage into one location protected by the same techniques as /tmp.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route" should be set to "0".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route set to 0

metadata.title: Verify File Hashes with RPM
metadata.description: Verify the MD5 hashes of system binaries using the RPM database.

metadata.title: Find setuid files from system packages
metadata.description: All files with setuid should be owned by a base system package

metadata.title: Package ypbind Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package ypbind should be removed.

metadata.title: Audit System Administrator Actions
metadata.description: Audit actions taken by system administrators on the system.

metadata.title: Package aide Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package aide should be installed.

metadata.title: Service tftp Disabled
metadata.description: The tftp service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package tftp-server removed or service tftp is not configured to start
service tftp is not configured to start

metadata.title: Service xinetd Disabled
metadata.description: The xinetd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package xinetd removed or service xinetd is not configured to start
service xinetd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Service avahi-daemon Disabled
metadata.description: The avahi-daemon service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: service avahi-daemon is not configured to start

metadata.title: UID 0 Belongs Only To Root
metadata.description: Only the root account should be assigned a user id of 0.

criterion.comment: tests for reg exp ^[^r][^o][^o][^t].*:0 in /etc/passwd file

metadata.title: Service bluetooth Disabled
metadata.description: The bluetooth service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: service bluetooth is not configured to start

metadata.title: Package talk-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package talk-server should be removed.

metadata.title: Service netfs Disabled
metadata.description: The netfs service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: service netfs is not configured to start

metadata.title: Ensure auditd Collects Information on the Use of Privileged Commands
metadata.description: Audit rules about the Information on the Use of Privileged Commands are enabled

criterion.comment: /etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F path=/bin/ping -F perm=x -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k privileged

metadata.title: Service atd Disabled
metadata.description: The atd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package at removed or service atd is not configured to start
service atd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter set to 1

metadata.title: Ensure Logwatch HostLimit Configured
metadata.description: Test if HostLimit line in logwatch.conf is set appropriately.

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through Stime
metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through stime, note that this is only relevant on 32bit architecture.

criteria.comment: Test for either...
both ...

metadata.title: Service cgred Disabled
metadata.description: The cgred service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: service cgred is not configured to start

metadata.title: Enable Auditing for Processes Which Start Prior to the Audit Daemon
metadata.description: Look for argument audit=1 in the kernel line in /etc/grub.conf.

metadata.title: Disable rds Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module rds should be disabled.

metadata.title: Package iptables Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package iptables should be installed.

metadata.title: Service messagebus Disabled
metadata.description: The messagebus service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package dbus removed or service messagebus is not configured to start
service messagebus is not configured to start

metadata.title: Add noexec Option to Removable Media Partitions
metadata.description: The noexec mount option prevents the direct execution of binaries on the mounted filesystem. Users should not be allowed to execute binaries that exist on partitions mounted from removable media (such as a USB key). The noexec option prevents code from being executed directly from the media itself, and may therefore provide a line of defense against certain types of worms or malicious code.

metadata.title: Package vsftpd Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package vsftpd should be installed.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter set to 1

metadata.title: Disable root Login via SSH
metadata.description: Root login via SSH should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Restrict Virtual Console Root Logins
metadata.description: Preventing direct root login to virtual console devices helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

metadata.title: Lock out account after failed login attempts
metadata.description: The number of allowed failed logins should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
metadata.description: The password expiration warning age should be set appropriately.

metadata.title: Manually Assign IPv6 Router Address
metadata.description: Define default gateways for IPv6 traffic

metadata.title: Disallow inbound firewall access to the SSH Server port.
metadata.description: If inbound SSH access is not needed, the firewall should disallow or reject access to the SSH port (22).

metadata.title: Write permissions are disabled for group and other in all directories in Root's Path
metadata.description: Check each directory in root's path and make use it does not grant write permission to group and other

criteria.comment: Check that write permission to group and other in root's path is denied

criterion.comment: Check for write permission to group in root's path
Check for write permission to other in root's path

metadata.title: Package httpd Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package httpd should be removed.

metadata.title: Package portreserve Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package portreserve should be removed.

metadata.title: System Login Banner Compliance
metadata.description: The system login banner text should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Enable SELinux in /etc/grub.conf
metadata.description: Check if selinux=0 OR enforcing=0 within /etc/grub.conf lines, fail if found.

criterion.comment: check value selinux|enforcing=0 in /etc/grub.conf, fail if found

metadata.title: Ensure Logwatch SplitHosts Configured
metadata.description: Check if SplitHosts line in logwatch.conf is set appropriately.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians set to 1

metadata.title: Ensure /var/log/audit Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: Audit logs are stored in the /var/log/audit directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume. Make absolutely certain that it is large enough to store all audit logs that will be created by the auditing daemon.

metadata.title: Package xinetd Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package xinetd should be removed.

metadata.title: No nullok Option in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
metadata.description: The file /etc/pam.d/system-auth should not contain the nullok option

criterion.comment: make sure the nullok option is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth

metadata.title: Service rdisc Disabled
metadata.description: The rdisc service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package iputils removed or service rdisc is not configured to start
service rdisc is not configured to start

metadata.title: Package subscription-manager Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package subscription-manager should be removed.

metadata.title: Package postfix Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package postfix should be installed.

metadata.title: Audit Information Export To Media
metadata.description: Audit rules that detect the mounting of filesystems should be enabled.

metadata.title: Auditd Email Account to Notify Upon Action
metadata.description: action_mail_acct setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain account

metadata.title: Set Password difok Requirements
metadata.description: The password difok should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Find files unowned by a group
metadata.description: All files should be owned by a group

criterion.comment: Check all files and make sure they are owned by a group

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "kernel.dmesg_restrict" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.dmesg_restrict" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.dmesg_restrict set to 1

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "kernel.exec-shield" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.exec-shield" should be set to "1".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.exec-shield set to 1

metadata.title: Package openswan Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package openswan should be installed.

metadata.title: Disable Printer Browsing Entirely if Possible
metadata.description: The CUPS print service can be configured to broadcast a list of available printers to the network. Other machines on the network, also running the CUPS print service, can be configured to listen to these broadcasts and add and configure these printers for immediate use. By disabling this browsing capability, the machine will no longer generate or receive such broadcasts.

metadata.title: Lock out account after failed login attempts
metadata.description: The number of allowed failed logins should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Ensure Yum gpgcheck Globally Activated
metadata.description: The gpgcheck option should be used to ensure that checking of an RPM package's signature always occurs prior to its installation.

metadata.title: Enable GUI Warning Banner
metadata.description: Enable the GUI warning banner.

metadata.title: Package hal Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package hal should be removed.

metadata.title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk is Low on Space
metadata.description: admin_space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

metadata.title: Mount Remote Filesystems with nosuid
metadata.description: The nosuid option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

metadata.description: The RPM package iputils should be removed.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fremovexattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.description: Look for argument "nousb" in the kernel line in /etc/grub.conf

criterion.comment: look for argument 'nousb' in the kernel line in /etc/grub.conf

metadata.title: Disable Core Dumps
metadata.description: Core dumps for all users should be disabled

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses" should be set to "1".

metadata.title: Package abrt Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package abrt should be removed.

metadata.title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
metadata.description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: File grub.conf Owned By root Group
metadata.description: The grub.conf file should be owned by the root group. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub/grub.conf or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.conf

metadata.title: Audit File Deletion Events
metadata.description: Audit files deletion events.

metadata.title: Find Unauthorized World-Writable Files
metadata.description: The world-write permission should be disabled for all files.

metadata.description: The RPM package dbus should be removed.

metadata.description: The kernel module bluetooth should be disabled.

metadata.description: All files with setgid should be owned by a base system package

metadata.description: The password retry should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Package cyrus-sasl Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package cyrus-sasl should be removed.

metadata.title: Add nodev Option to Non-Root Local Partitions
metadata.description: The nodev mount option prevents files from being interpreted as character or block devices. Legitimate character and block devices should exist in the /dev directory on the root partition or within chroot jails built for system services. All other locations should not allow character and block devices.

metadata.description: The SSH idle timeout interval should be set to an appropriate value.

metadata.description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.description: Ensure all yum repositories utilize signature checking.

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts" should be set to "1".

metadata.description: max_log_file setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

metadata.description: All files should be owned by a user

metadata.title: No Legacy .rhosts Or hosts.equiv Files
metadata.description: There should not be any .rhosts or hosts.equiv files on the system.

metadata.title: Add nosuid Option to /dev/shm
metadata.description: The nosuid mount option should be set for temporary storage partitions such as /dev/shm. The suid/sgid permissions should not be required in these world-writable directories.

metadata.title: Package telnet-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package telnet-server should be removed.

metadata.title: Disable Support for RPC IPv6
metadata.description: Disable ipv6 based rpc services

metadata.title: Device Files Have Proper SELinux Context
metadata.description: All device files in /dev should be assigned an SELinux security context other than 'unlabeled_t'.

metadata.title: Ensure /home Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: If user home directories will be stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

metadata.title: Disable jffs2 Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module jffs2 should be disabled.

metadata.description: The SSH ClientAliveCountMax should be set to an appropriate value (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.description: The RPM package vsftpd should be removed.

metadata.title: Implement idle activation of screen saver
metadata.description: Idle activation of the screen saver should be enabled.

criterion.comment: gnome screensaver is activated on idle

metadata.title: Package iptables-ipv6 Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package iptables-ipv6 should be installed.

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects" should be set to "0".

metadata.title: Service quota_nld Disabled
metadata.description: The quota_nld service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package quota removed or service quota_nld is not configured to start
service quota_nld is not configured to start

metadata.title: Add nodev Option to Removable Media Partitions
metadata.description: The nodev mount option prevents files from being interpreted as character or block devices. Legitimate character and block devices should exist in the /dev directory on the root partition or within chroot jails built for system services. All other locations should not allow character and block devices.

metadata.title: Verify /etc/passwd Permissions
metadata.description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

metadata.title: Verify /etc/shadow Permissions
metadata.description: This test makes sure that /etc/shadow is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0000. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

metadata.title: Add noexec Option to /tmp
metadata.description: It can be dangerous to allow the execution of binaries from world-writable temporary storage directories such as /tmp. The noexec mount option prevents binaries from being executed out of /tmp.

metadata.title: Disable IPv6 Kernel Module Functionality via Disable Option
metadata.description: The disable option will allow the IPv6 module to be inserted, but prevent address assignment and activation of the network stack.

criterion.comment: ipv6 disabled any modprobe conf file

metadata.title: Set Password dcredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password dcredit should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Package smartmontools Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package smartmontools should be removed.

metadata.title: Lock out account after failed login attempts
metadata.description: The number of allowed failed logins should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Manually Assign Global IPv6 Address
metadata.description: Manually configure addresses for IPv6

criterion.comment: Set static IPv6 address on each interface

metadata.title: Use Only Approved Ciphers
metadata.description: Limit the ciphers to those which are FIPS-approved and only use ciphers in counter (CTR) mode.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Service squid Disabled
metadata.description: The squid service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package squid removed or service squid is not configured to start
service squid is not configured to start

metadata.title: Verify user who owns 'gshadow' file
metadata.description: The /etc/gshadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects" should be set to "0".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects set to 0

metadata.title: Disable Interactive Boot
metadata.description: The ability for users to perform interactive startups should be disabled.

metadata.title: Ensure auditd Collects Unauthorized Access Attempts to Files (unsuccessful)
metadata.description: Audit rules about the Unauthorized Access Attempts to Files (unsuccessful) are enabled

metadata.title: Disable freevxfs Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module freevxfs should be disabled.

metadata.title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values set for csh

metadata.title: Package dhcp Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package dhcp should be removed.

metadata.title: Disable DHCP Client
metadata.description: DHCP configuration should be static for all interfaces.

metadata.description: All password hashes should be shadowed.

metadata.description: The acpid service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.title: Verify group who owns 'passwd' file
metadata.description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.title: Package samba-common Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package samba-common should be removed.

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects" should be set to "0".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects set to 0

metadata.title: Ensure /var/log Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: System logs are stored in the /var/log directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume.

metadata.title: Package xorg-x11-server-common Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package xorg-x11-server-common should be removed.

metadata.description: It can be dangerous to allow the execution of binaries from world-writable temporary storage directories such as /dev/shm. The noexec mount option prevents binaries from being executed out of /dev/shm.

metadata.description: The RPM package sendmail should be removed.

metadata.description: The kernel module udf should be disabled.

metadata.description: The RPM package dhcpd should be removed.

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Set Password minclass Requirements
metadata.description: The password minclass should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Disable Zeroconf Networking
metadata.description: Disable Zeroconf automatic route assignment in the 169.254.0.0 subnet.

metadata.title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
metadata.description: The maximum password age policy should meet minimum requirements.

criteria.comment: the value PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through /etc/localtime

metadata.description: The /etc/httpd/conf/* files should have the appropriate permissions.

metadata.title: Service smartd Disabled
metadata.description: The smartd service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.description: Idle activation of the screen lock should be enabled.

metadata.description: Protect against unnecessary release of information.

metadata.description: Generic test for x86_64 architecture to be used by other tests

metadata.description: Enable privacy extensions for IPv6

metadata.description: The kernel module squashfs should be disabled.

metadata.title: Service portreserve Disabled
metadata.description: The portreserve service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.title: Package cronie Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package cronie should be installed.

metadata.title: Service saslauthd Disabled
metadata.description: The saslauthd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package cyrus-sasl removed or service saslauthd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Service iptables Enabled
metadata.description: The iptables service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package iptables installed and service iptables is configured to start
service iptables is configured to start

metadata.title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
metadata.description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate group.

criterion.comment: check if group root owns all syslog log files

metadata.title: Configure LDAP to Use TLS for All Transactions
metadata.description: Require the use of TLS for ldap clients.

criteria.comment: package pam_ldap is not present

extend_definition.comment: pam_ldap not present or not in use

metadata.title: Disable Printer Server if Possible
metadata.description: By default, locally configured printers will not be shared over the network, but if this functionality has somehow been enabled, these recommendations will disable it again. Be sure to disable outgoing printer list broadcasts, or remote users will still be able to see the locally configured printers, even if they cannot actually print to them. To limit print serving to a particular set of users, use the Policy directive.

metadata.title: Service rsyslog Enabled
metadata.description: The rsyslog service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package rsyslog installed and service rsyslog is configured to start
service rsyslog is configured to start

metadata.title: Package ntp Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package ntp should be installed.

metadata.title: Service rexec Disabled
metadata.description: The rexec service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package rsh-server removed or service rexec is not configured to start

metadata.title: Disable All GNOME Thumbnailers
metadata.description: The system's default desktop environment, GNOME, uses a number of different thumbnailer programs to generate thumbnails for any new or modified content in an opened folder. Disable the execution of these thumbnail applications within GNOME.

metadata.title: Verify /etc/gshadow Permissions
metadata.description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0000. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

metadata.description: The rhsmcertd service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.title: SELinux Enforcing
metadata.description: The SELinux state should be enforcing the local policy.

metadata.title: Package ypserv Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package ypserv should be removed.

metadata.title: Package openldap-servers Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package openldap-servers should be removed.

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through Adjtimex
metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through adjtimex.

both ...

metadata.title: Package screen Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package screen should be installed.

metadata.title: Directory /etc/httpd/conf/ Permissions
metadata.description: Directory permissions for /etc/httpd/conf/ should be set to 0750.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "kernel.randomize_va_space" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.randomize_va_space" should be set to "2".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.randomize_va_space set to 2

metadata.title: Enable SSL in Dovecot
metadata.description: SSL capabilities should be enabled for the mail server.

metadata.title: Service haldaemon Disabled
metadata.description: The haldaemon service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - removexattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - setxattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Ensure All Logs are Rotated by logrotate
metadata.description: The logrotate (syslog rotater) service should be enabled.

metadata.title: Send Logs to a Remote Loghost
metadata.description: Syslog logs should be sent to a remote loghost

metadata.title: Package at Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package at should be removed.

metadata.title: Verify that Shared Library Files Have Restrictive Permissions
metadata.description: Checks that /lib, /lib64, /usr/lib, /usr/lib64, /lib/modules, and objects therein, are not group-writable or world-writable.

metadata.description: SSH host-based authentication should be disabled.

metadata.description: The kernel module usb-storage should be disabled.

metadata.title: File grub.conf Owned By root User
metadata.description: The grub.conf file should be owned by the root user. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub/grub.conf or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.conf

metadata.description: The crond service should be enabled if possible.

metadata.description: The auditd service should be enabled if possible.

metadata.title: Add nodev Option to /dev/shm
metadata.description: Legitimate character and block devices should not exist within temporary directories like /dev/shm. The nodev mount option should be specified for /dev/shm.

metadata.title: Package oddjob Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package oddjob should be removed.

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Logon and Logout Events

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.description: The kernel module hfsplus should be disabled.

metadata.description: The cgconfig service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.title: Verify /var/log/audit Permissions
metadata.description: Checks for correct permissions for all log files in /var/log/audit.

metadata.title: Service ypbind Disabled
metadata.description: The ypbind service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package ypbind removed or service ypbind is not configured to start
service ypbind is not configured to start

metadata.title: Package policycoreutils Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package policycoreutils should be installed.

metadata.title: Proper Permissions User Home Directories
metadata.description: File permissions should be set correctly for the home directories for all user accounts.

metadata.title: System Accounts Do Not Run a Shell
metadata.description: The root account is the only system account that should have a login shell.

criterion.comment: tests for the presence of login shells (not /sbin/nologin) for system accounts in /etc/passwd file

metadata.title: Service named Disabled
metadata.description: The named service should be disabled if possible.

service named is not configured to start

metadata.title: Add nodev Option to /tmp
metadata.description: Legitimate character and block devices should not exist within temporary directories like /tmp. The nodev mount option should be specified for /tmp.

metadata.title: Set Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
metadata.description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/pam.d/system-auth.

metadata.title: Ensure /var Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: Ensuring that /var is mounted on its own partition enables the setting of more restrictive mount options, which is used as temporary storage by many program, particularly system services such as daemons. It is not uncommon for the /var directory to contain world-writable directories, installed by other software packages.

metadata.title: Set Password lcredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password lcredit should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Disable Empty Passwords
metadata.description: Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Ensure that No Dangerous Directories Exist in Root's Path
metadata.description: The environment variable PATH should be set correctly for the root user.

criteria.comment: environment variable PATH contains dangerous path

criterion.comment: environment variable PATH starts with : or .
environment variable PATH contains : twice in a row
environment variable PATH contains . twice in a row
environment variable PATH ends with : or .
environment variable PATH doesn't begin with a /
environment variable PATH doesn't contain relative paths

metadata.title: Audit Kernel Module Loading and Unloading
metadata.description: The audit rules should be configured to log information about kernel module loading and unloading.

metadata.title: TFTP Daemon Uses Secure Mode
metadata.description: The TFTP daemon should use secure mode.

criteria.comment: package tftp-server removed or /etc/xinetd.d/tftp configured correctly

metadata.title: Require Authentication for Single-User Mode
metadata.description: The requirement for a password to boot into single-user mode should be configured correctly.

metadata.title: Ensure Only Protocol 2 Connections Allowed
metadata.description: The OpenSSH daemon should be running protocol 2.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.ip_forward" should be set to "0".

metadata.description: Audit rules that detect changes to the system's mandatory access controls (SELinux) are enabled.

metadata.description: The RPM package sysstat should be removed.

metadata.description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_ra" Check
metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_ra" should be set to "0".

criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_ra set to 0

metadata.title: Disable Plaintext Authentication in Dovecot
metadata.description: Plaintext authentication of mail clients should be disabled.

criteria.comment: Disable Plaintext Authentication in Dovecot

metadata.title: Require Client SMB Packet Signing in smb.conf
metadata.description: Require samba clients which use smb.conf, such as smbclient, to use packet signing. A Samba client should only communicate with servers who can support SMB packet signing.

criterion.comment: check for client signing = mandatory in /etc/samba/smb.conf

metadata.title: Set Boot Loader Password
metadata.description: The grub boot loader should have password protection enabled.

criterion.comment: make sure a password is defined in /etc/grub.conf

metadata.title: Service autofs Disabled
metadata.description: The autofs service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: service autofs is not configured to start

metadata.title: Make Audit Configuration Immutable
metadata.description: Force a reboot to change audit rules is enabled

metadata.title: Set Password ocredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password ocredit should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

metadata.title: Audit User/Group Information
metadata.description: Audit rules should detect modification to system files that hold information about users and groups.

metadata.title: Configure LDAP CA Certificate Path
metadata.description: Require the use of TLS for ldap clients.

criteria.comment: package pam_ldap is not present

extend_definition.comment: pam_ldap not present or in use

metadata.title: Deactivate Wireless Interfaces
metadata.description: All wireless interfaces should be disabled.

metadata.description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

metadata.title: Verify user who owns 'shadow' file
metadata.description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.title: Package ntpdate Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package ntpdate should be removed.

metadata.title: Limit Password Reuse
metadata.description: The passwords to remember should be set correctly.

metadata.description: A remote NTP Server for time synchronization should be specified (and dependencies are met)

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Process and Session Initiation Information
metadata.description: Audit rules should capture information about session initiation.

metadata.title: Disable sctp Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module sctp should be disabled.

metadata.title: Set SHA512 Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/libuser.conf
metadata.description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/libuser.conf.

metadata.title: Require Client SMB Packet Signing, if using mount.cifs
metadata.description: Require packet signing of clients who mount Samba shares using the mount.cifs program (e.g., those who specify shares in /etc/fstab). To do so, ensure that signing options (either sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i) are used.

criterion.comment: check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/fstab
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/mtab

metadata.description: Check for pam_ldap.so presence.

criteria.comment: package pam_ldap is present and used

metadata.description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.description: The RPM package irqbalance should be installed.

metadata.title: Directory /var/log/httpd/ Permissions
metadata.description: Directory permissions for /var/log/httpd should be set to 0750.

metadata.description: The dhcpd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package dhcp removed or service dhcpd is not configured to start
service dhcpd is not configured to start

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Auditd Action to Take When Maximum Log Size Reached
metadata.description: max_log_file_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

metadata.title: Service sysstat Disabled
metadata.description: The sysstat service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package sysstat removed or service sysstat is not configured to start
service sysstat is not configured to start

metadata.title: Add nosuid Option to Removable Media Partitions
metadata.description: The nosuid mount option prevents set-user-identifier (suid) and set-group-identifier (sgid) permissions from taking effect. These permissions allow users to execute binaries with the same permissions as the owner and group of the file respectively. Users should not be allowed to introduce suid and guid files into the system via partitions mounted from removeable media.

metadata.title: Package nfs-utils Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package nfs-utils should be removed.

metadata.title: Service certmonger Disabled
metadata.description: The certmonger service should be disabled if possible.

metadata.description: The kernel module tipc should be disabled.

metadata.description: The system's default desktop environment, GNOME, will mount devices and removable media (such as DVDs, CDs and USB flash drives) whenever they are inserted into the system. Disable automount and autorun within GNOME.

metadata.description: rsyslogd should reject remote messages

metadata.title: Verify File Ownership And Permissions Using RPM
metadata.description: Verify the integrity of installed packages by comparing the installed files with information about the files taken from the package metadata stored in the RPM database.

criterion.comment: user ownership of all files matches local rpm database
group ownership of all files matches local rpm database
mode of all files matches local rpm database

metadata.title: Verify group who owns 'gshadow' file
metadata.description: The /etc/gshadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.title: Service rhnsd Disabled
metadata.description: The rhnsd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package rhnsd removed or service rhnsd is not configured to start
service rhnsd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 Workstation is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 Server is installed

metadata.title: Package mdadm Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package mdadm should be removed.

unix:file_test.comment: all local world-writable directories have sticky bit set

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies set to 1
kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects set to 0

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure bind mount option is on /var/tmp

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route set to 0

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: tests for reg exp ^[^r][^o][^o][^t].*:0 in /etc/passwd file
/etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F path=/bin/ping -F perm=x -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k privileged

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter set to 1

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the for presence of 32bit -S stime and key

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter set to 1

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the PermitRootLogin[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth
Tests the value of PASS_WARN_AGE in /etc/login.defs
Test for port 22 access over ipv4
Test for port 22 access over ipv6

unix:file_test.comment: Check that write permission to group in root's path is denied
Check that write permission to other in root's path is denied

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: check value selinux|enforcing=0 in /etc/grub.conf, fail if found

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians set to 1

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: make sure nullok is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth

notes.note: This will enumerate all files on local partitions

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.dmesg_restrict set to 1
kernel runtime parameter kernel.exec-shield set to 1

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth
look for argument 'nousb' in the kernel line in /etc/grub.conf
Tests the value of the ^[\s]*\*[\s]+(hard|-)[\s]+core[\s]+([\d]+) setting in the /etc/security/limits.conf file

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses set to 1

unix:file_test.comment: Files that end in .log in /var/log owned by root

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the for presence of 32bit -S clock_settime and key
Tests the for presence of 64bit -S clock_settime and key
check for existence of gpgcheck=0 in /etc/yum.repos.d/ files

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts set to 1
kernel runtime parameter net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_redirects set to 0
kernel runtime parameter fs.suid_dumpable set to 0

unix:file_test.comment: check for local directories that are world writable and have uid greater than or equal to 500

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: the value INACTIVE parameter should be set appropriately in /etc/default/useradd

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects set to 0

ind:unknown_test.comment: use extended content to evaluated this test

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of PASS_MIN_DAYS in /etc/login.defs
the value maxlogins should be set appropriately in /etc/security/limits.conf
Tests the value of the ^[\s]*SELINUXTYPE[\s]*=[\s]*([^#]*) expression in the /etc/selinux/config file
Tests the value of the Banner[\s]+/etc/issue setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects set to 0

notes.note: This will enumerate all files on local partitions

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Test for udp6 based rpc services
Test for tcp6 based rpc services

ind:xmlfilecontent_test.comment: gnome screensaver is activated on idle

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects set to 0

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: ipv6 disabled any modprobe conf file

check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth
Set static IPv6 address on each interface
tests the value of Ciphers setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects set to 0

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ^[\s]*umask[\s]+([^#]*) expression in the /etc/csh.cshrc file
Tests the value of the ^[\s]*BOOTPROTO[\s]*=[\s]*([^#]*) expression in the /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-.* file

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects set to 0

the value PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs
Tests the for presence etc localtime file in the rules file
inet_interfaces in /etc/postfix/main.cf should be set correctly
Enable privacy extensions on each interface

ind:xmlfilecontent_test.comment: gnome screensaver set to blank screen

ind:unknown_test.comment: use extended content to evaluated this test

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ssl start_tls setting in the /etc/pam_ldap.conf file
Disable the more general port directive
Listen only at the localhost level
Tests the for presence of 32bit -S adjtime and key
Tests the for presence of 64bit -S adjtime and key

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.randomize_va_space set to 2

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ssl[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/dovecot.conf file

ind:unknown_test.comment: use extended content to evaluated this test

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the \*\.\*[\s]+@ setting in the /etc/syslog.conf file
Tests the value of the IgnoreRhosts[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
tests for the presence of login shells (not /sbin/nologin) for system accounts in /etc/passwd file
Tests the value of the PermitEmptyPasswords[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file

ind:environmentvariable58_test.comment: environment variable PATH starts with : or .
environment variable PATH doesn't contain : twice in a row
environment variable PATH doesn't contain . twice in a row
environment variable PATH ends with : or .
environment variable PATH starts with an absolute path /
environment variable PATH contains relative paths

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests that the SINGLE variable in the /etc/sysconfig/init file is set to /sbin/sulogin, to ensure that a password must be entered to access single user mode

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.ip_forward set to 0
kernel runtime parameter net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_ra set to 0

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the disable_plaintext_auth[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/dovecot.conf file
check for client signing = mandatory in /etc/samba/smb.conf
make sure a password is defined in /etc/grub.conf
Tests the value of the tls_cacertdir setting in the /etc/pam_ldap.conf file
Tests the value of the tls_cacertfile setting in the /etc/pam_ldap.conf file
Ensure at least one NTP server is set
The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/libuser.conf
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/fstab
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/mtab
Check if pam_ldap.so is uncommented in a file in pam.d
Ensure that the /etc/rsyslog.conf does not contain $InputTCPServerRun | $UDPServerRun | $InputRELPServerRun

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route set to 0

Tests the value of the ^[\s]*umask[\s]+([^#]*) expression in the /etc/profile file

Red Hat auxiliary key package is installed
